programme.title: 非一般递送 Special Delivery - EP 5
programme.desc: In the mountainous area of Tuyen Quang province, Vietnam, is a tribal commune isolated from modernity and from loved ones who have gone to the cities in search of better lives. Emails and SMS-es are practically non-existent to the point where the tribes rely on a special postman to deliver items from loved ones. Host Daniel Hutchinson joins the postman in delivering personal packages to the families but not before embarking on an arduous journey to where the tribes are situated.

programme.title: 老友万岁 Old Is Gold - EP 120
programme.desc: (R) Mei Fang receives a request from Ling Dong Group to purchase the land where the Centenarian Home is, she strongly refuses to sell the land but Xiang Rong points out that selling land is the only way to solve the financial crisis that the Centenarian Home is facing. If this opportunity is not held onto, the Centenarian Home might be ruined under Mei Fang's management. Mei Fang is unhappy and starts an argument with Xiang Rong. (PG)(重)美芳收到领东集团购买千岁之家地皮的来电请求，她坚决不卖地，但向荣却指出卖地是目前唯一能解决千岁之家经济危机的方法，若不抓紧机会，千岁之家甚至可能毁在美芳手里。美芳不满，与向荣起了争执。.

programme.title: 万福楼 Bountiful Blessings - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) Kitchen God and Dong Hai switch souls and Kitchen God has no choice but to remain in Wan Fu Lou using Dong Hai's identity. The fairy Pinhong realizes that Dafeng is still in love with Fuxi. She also realizes that the Kitchen God is working in Wan Fu Lou. She plots her revenge because it was the Kitchen God who revealed that she was in love with a mortal and the heavenly courts not only separated them but banished her to earth. (重)灶神与东海调换元神，只好以东海身份在万福楼掌厨。憎恨厨师的品红刻意接近大丰，察觉大丰对福喜不能忘情，于是到万福楼窥探，发现在万福楼掌厨的就是灶神。品红因与凡人相恋，却因灶神无意中泄漏，导致她与恋人分手，还被贬下凡间，因此对灶神怀恨在心。.

programme.title: 祖先保佑2 Blessings 2 - EP 15

This makes Dong Liang embarrassed, and he fled. Sai Ding even hired gangsters to beat Dong Liang. Jue Hui is disheartened by Sai Ding's vengeful attitude and decided to break up with him. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)赛鼎得知栋梁患有花柳病，气愤难平，暗中收买人在大庭广众下揭发他嫖妓的行为，令栋梁颜面尽失，狼狈而逃，赛鼎甚至还进一步收买流氓去殴打他。觉慧得知此事，对赛鼎有仇必报的性格感到心寒，向他提出分手。.

programme.title: 老友万岁 Old Is Gold - EP 121
programme.desc: Xin Xin is caught off guard by Hugo's sudden confession and she makes it clear that she does not have time for a relationship right now. Hugo does not force Xin Xin to make a decision, and the two remain as just friends. Hugo bumps into Ping Pong and the two have a face-to-face confrontation, persuading each other to give up but to no avail. (PG)欣欣面对Hugo的突然示爱，措手不及，表明自己现阶段没时间也没心思谈恋爱，Hugo也不再逼欣欣做决定，两人回到朋友关系。随后，Hugo巧遇Ping Pong，两人首次正面交锋，各自劝彼此放弃，但都不成功。.

programme.title: 午餐吃什么 What's For Lunch? - EP 7
programme.desc: "What's For Lunch?" meet up with songstress Joanna Dong and "Broadway Beng" Sebastian Tan at a Zi Char stall in Stirling Road that is famous for its Mushroom Pot. Join us for a time full of laughs and stories! Co-stars Bryan Wong and Sheila Sim visit a Si Chuan restaurant in Tiong Bahru. Spicy dishes are Sheila's favourite, but what about Bryan? What other stories do they have for us? “午餐吃什么？” 两位实力唱将董姿彦和陈瑞彪来到了女皇镇邻里咖啡店的煮炒摊，这里的镇店之宝有哪些？两位嘉宾最近又在忙什么呢？下半场我们跟随名嘴王禄江和名模沈琳宸来到中峇鲁，爱吃辣的沈琳宸推荐一家地道川菜馆，除了招牌料理辣子鸡、回锅肉，这里还有什么美食呢？节目精彩，不要错过！.

programme.title: 天空渐渐亮 Daybreak - EP 18
programme.desc: Wan An agreed to Tianliang's marriage proposal out of revenge, but changed her mind on the day of registration. She told Tianliang about how he indirectly caused the death of her mother, and her plan on revenge. She wanted to leave everything behind and not see Tianliang again. Tianliang was shocked, and insist on marrying her for a lifetime of compensation. (PG)婉安答应天亮求婚，打算折磨他作为报复，但注册结婚仪式当天却改变主意。她把天亮害得她母亲无法送医的事说出，坦言与他结婚是想报复，但现在决定离去，不想再见到他。天亮震惊，坚持与婉安结婚，表示要用自己的一生来赎罪……。.

programme.title: 城寨英雄 A Fist Within Four Walls - EP 17

(PG13-暴力镜头)(重)众街坊跪求勾拳与迎风接受春美的赌局，二人不忍街坊受苦，答应与春美对赌。三朵金花到医院探望刁兰，发现她不见了！刁兰伺机暗杀春美，不敌受伤晕倒。.

programme.title: 小村大任务 Mission Possible - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Together with experts, the host will venture into the rural areas where people live in poverty and observe what the locals do for a living. Focusing on available resources, the expert then designs a 3-day workshop for the locals, with the goal to inspire and teach them how to improve their handicraft skills and increase their productivity. In the long-run, it is hoped that their standard of living will be improved. (重) (本地综艺节目) 本节目透过主持人，带领专家深入贫困、落后的地区，了解当地居民赖以为生的技能，并以当地材料，给居民设计为期三天的课程，启发和教导他们如何改良手工艺，籍此提高生产力和竞争力，长远而言可以改善生活。.

programme.title: 快乐火柴 Magic Match Sticks - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) Tiger, Jielun and Feifei are best friends. Lingling, the trio's study group leader finds them her worst nightmare because they are not interested in their studies. One day, Tiger meets a scientist who gives him a box of "happy matchsticks" which gives the trio whatever they desire. However, as soon as the fire on the matchstick extinguishes, their wishes and illusions vanish. Lingling urges them to stop by telling them that the desires are just illusions, and wants them to face reality and work hard. Will the trio listen and change or will they continue on with their mistakes? (重)Tiger, 哲伦 和菲菲是死党。小组长玲玲聪明伶俐，不喜欢三人在学业上差劲的态度。有一天，Tiger 遇见一位给他"快乐火柴"的科学家。"快乐火柴"能够给三人无限的快乐，三人要什么就有什么。可是，当火柴一熄灭，他们的欲望和理想都会消失。玲玲劝他们脚踏实地，面对现实。三人会否听她的劝告改过自新还是死不悔改呢？.

programme.title: 少年师爷 Little Counsellor Season 11 & 12 - EP 0023 & 0024

(重)《健康在于你11》新系列节目再次邀请主持人林佩芬和大家一起探讨各种健康课题，分享如何通过益生菌保健，展开健康生活，阐明预防胜于治疗与自我保健的重要性，希望大家都能吃得健康、活得健康。.

(重)美那多是印度尼西亚最能吃辣的地区，当地人最喜爱的辣椒是Cabe Rawit，家发与当地看准商机的一对辣椒姐妹花碰面，品尝了她们制作的驰名辣蘸酱，以及和辣酱绝配的道地美食，也到访了著名的野味市场，了解当地人对辣椒的狂爱！.

programme.desc: (R) The story begins with Kaixin as the abbot of Wulong Temple. Kongli asks Baida, who is a hopeless gambler, to impersonate Tietong so as to keep Kaixin under his control. Kaixin falls for the sham and believes that Tietong has reincarnated. (重)二十年后，圆慧的胞弟紫薇真人高居当朝国师。开心小和尚从少林寺调到乌龙寺做主持，使该寺戒律院主管铁空又气又爱，更是搞得县衙门老爷、师爷头痛不已。街头混混百搭阴差阳错成了开心的铁桶师叔，麻烦接踵而来。.

programme.title: 星期二特写 - 我就是我 Tuesday Report - Be Myself - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) "Be Myself" is an 8 episode series produced by Tuesday Report, revealing stories of a group of young adults aged 35 years and below. They are not afraid to face new challenges, and are determined to realise their dreams. The series aims to explore how the attitudes and values of these young adults shaped who they are today. (重)“星期二特写”八集系列《我就是我》，讲述一群三十五岁以下年轻人的精彩故事。这群年轻人有个性，有特色，有想法，对生活充满热情，对社会有独特见解，并且勇于面对生活挑战，敢于追逐自己的梦想。节目探讨年轻人的态度与价值观，看看他们如何打造自己的人生，创造一条与众不同的道路。.

programme.title: 团圆饭 Reunion Dinner - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) The reunion dinner is very significant to Chinese: it is the gathering of the family. Through the characters' insistence on and "frenzied" preparations for the Reunion Dinner, the serial brings out the importance of the family. (重)演员:陈莉萍饰阿萍;王昱清饰梁天华;陈汉玮饰刘家昌;莫小玲饰林芳芳;鐘琴饰Banana;唐育书饰胡达雄.

programme.title: 小店铺 Little Shops - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) With a heart bigger than his shop size, Jason is a rare gem in Marine Crescent. He runs the neighbourhood mobile shop quite unlike the ones we see enroute home from the mrt station. As the saying goes, attitude makes a man, and Jasons made him the superhero in this area made up mainly of our pioneer generation. Watch as this miniscule shop transform into a tech hub! (重)每一个邻里都有一些小店铺。在杂乱无章的小店里，累积了许多温馨感人的小故事。主持人李心钰将带着一位室内设计师走进这些有故事的店，为店面改头换面，让店主能在更好的环境继续营业。.

programme.title: 古早味侦探 Old Taste Detective - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Beef Noodle is a common dish among the Chinese nowadays. Each region has its own variation of this dish. In this episode, host Yi Feng and Chef Jason visit various local famous Beef Noodles stalls to learn about the cooking technique to recreate the old taste of the Hainanese Beef Noodle. (重)现今牛肉面已是华人的普遍食物，各地方的牛肉面都有其特色。本集节目里，主持人怡凤和林宜家师傅为了重塑古早味海南牛肉粉，走访多家牛肉面档口和餐馆，拜访牛肉面达人，学习烹调方法。.

programme.title: 阿公来做饭 Ah Gong Can Cook - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) Mothers' day is coming and it's time to whip up a sumptuous meal! Ah Gong presents his Teochew Braised Duck which was passed down by his late mother. The list of ingredients alone is enough to throw Kym and Irene Ang into a frenzy! How is Teochew Braised Duck different from others? What is the must-have ingredient? Watch to find out Chef Charlie's comment about Ah Gong's specialty! (重)母亲节快到了！大家有口福了！阿公将带来母亲传下来的潮州卤鸭，可这却难倒了鐘琴和洪爱玲！单是食材就让两人喊救命！潮州卤鸭的特点是什么？不可或缺的食材又是什么？对于阿公的卤鸭，Chef Charlie又有什么话说呢？别错过了《阿公来做饭》！.

programme.title: 梦想程式 Dream Coder - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) The owner reminds Hong Yi to move out in three days' time. Hong Yi wants Ya Yun to help him look for a lodging alternative. Zhen Long suggests that Hong Yi move in to his place temporarily, much to the disapproval of Ya Yun. (PG)(重)房东提醒宏毅三天后要搬走，宏毅才想起他为了帮雅芸找可可，才没将房东说的话放在心上，于是要雅芸负责帮他找住的地方。由于时间紧迫，镇隆建议宏毅先搬来他家暂住，等找到房子再搬，雅芸反对不果。.

programme.title: 梦想程式 Dream Coder - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) Zhen Long's ex-girlfriend has fallen out of love. In a bid to cheer her up, he stands Fang Ru up. Whilst cycling with his ex, he is reminded of their sweet past and is heartbroken. (PG)(重)镇隆的前女友瑞晴被骗婚，伤心不已，镇隆为了安慰她，没有赴方如的约会。方如担心他出事，传简讯问他失约的原因，镇隆说不出口，选择不回复。他陪着瑞晴到东海岸骑脚车重温往事，想起过往的甜蜜片段，心情复杂。.

programme.title: 狮城6点半 Singapore Today - EP 66
programme.desc: (Live) Daily updates on local news headlines and stories. （现场直播）《狮城6点半》每日为您提供最全面的本地新闻头条与报道。.

programme.title: 外国人在中国 - 我的少林故事 Foreigner In China - EP 2
programme.desc: This documentary tells stories of foreigners in China, including their lifestyle, their experiences and more importantly, how they think of China. This 2-parter follows a father who enrols his young daughter to a school of Shaolin to learn not only martial art skills but also the philosophy and meaning behind it.

programme.title: 黄飞鸿之英雄有梦 Martial Arts Movie: Rise Of The Legend
programme.desc: Two crime factions run the Huangpu Port: The Black Tiger and the Northern Sea. For years, the Black Tigers' boss Lei Gong has been trying to get rid of the leader of the Northern Sea. One of his latest recruits is Wong Fei-Hung, a fearless fighter who killed the leader. Recognizing Fei-Hungs talent, Lei Gong makes the young warrior his godson and one of his Four Tigers.Cast: Eddie Peng , Sammo Hung , Wang Luodan Director: Roy Chow (PG-些许暴力画面).

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: Daily evening updates on top local news and world news. 《晚间新闻》每日为您提供最全面的本地与全球新闻报道。.

programme.title: 爱玩客之移动厨房 2019 IWalker - Moving Kitchen 2019 - EP 7
programme.desc: Follow Li Yi and Yan Yong Lie as they embark on a tour round Taiwan whipping up yummy cuisines and hearty desserts. 本集邀请活泼的何美与永烈共同主持，加上来宾型男厨师陈昆煌，一起到台中，介绍开运必吃的特色美食，观赏让你纾压的火焰片鸭秀。最后在型男主厨协助下，完成中西结合的绕境美食，与参与大甲妈祖遶境的信徒分享。.

programme.title: 大力女都奉顺 Strong Girl Bong-Soon - EP 14
programme.desc: Guoduo found out that the culprit is Jin Changxian, boss of the junkyard but the case has been taken over by the Special Investigation Team. Therefore, Guodou's team is unable to get an arrest warrant and have no authority to investigate. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)国斗查到废弃汽车厂的老板金长贤就是犯人。但因这案子已交给了特搜队跟进，因此，国斗的团队无法获得逮捕令，也无权进行调查。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 47
programme.desc: Zhiyuan is happy when Daoying's assets are transferred to her. Daoying regains consciousness, but he can only remember that Zhiyuan is his secretary. Zhiyuan aims of becoming the CEO is thwarted when Daozhi brings his brother to the board meeting and exposes Zhiyuan's wrongdoings. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)智媛知道道英的财产已过户到她名下，暗自高兴。道英从昏迷中苏醒，只记得智媛是他的秘书。眼见理事长的位子唾手可得，道治却带着道英到理事会去揭穿智媛的恶行，把她的梦想摧毁。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 48
programme.desc: Maya finds a flyer with her photo. She dials the number on the flyer, speaks to Monian, but hangs up abruptly. Wulie realizes that Daoying's ex-wife is Cui Meixi and deduces that Haizhu is not Zhiyuan's biological daughter. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)玛亚无意中看到寻找春儿的传单，一眼就认出那个照片是自己，便照着传单上的电话打过去,但话没说完就挂断。武烈探望道英，却听到他一会儿要找洪秘书，一会儿又找海珠妈妈。武烈猜测海珠不是智媛亲生的。.

programme.title: 大话精 True Lies - EP 8
programme.desc: Nadia witnesses Mei Qi getting forced by Aidan to strip naked and hates Aidan for it. Nadia insists that Mei Qi is indeed her long lost sister and when Nadia and Aidan fall out, Mei Qi expresses guilt but is secretly pleased. Nadia is convinced that Aidan cannot change his ways and continues to lie to her about him seeking out Mei Qi when she was working as a prostitute in Thailand. She decides to give up and break up with him. Aidan refuses to accept that Nadia chooses to believe Mei Qi's lies over his truth and in a drunken stupor, he lies and wishes that he gets the ability to become a human lie detector for everyone. He wakes up to an ability to see a lie counter on top of every living thing. (PG-部分画面令人不安)Nadia亲睹美琪被Aidan逼着脱衣，Aidan含冤莫白， Nadia坚信美琪就是自己的妹妹。眼见Nadia和Aidan不欢而散，美琪表面愧疚，但内心暗喜。Aidan不甘心Nadia被美琪谎言蒙蔽，结果酒后意外撒谎，竟有了看穿谎言的能力！Aidan确认美琪就是伊娃，把消息告知德华，但德华却发生了意外，被Nadia送入院；两人遇上了小学同学伟雄，伟雄爆出了Aidan就是赵毅刚的秘密。。。.

programme.title: 武法律師 Lawless Lawyer - EP 4
programme.desc: Shangbi entrusts Jiongwan's case to Zaiyi when he is also sent to jail. Zaiyi brings Jiongwan's wife to see Mr Jiang. Unable to reject the pleas of Jiongwan's wife, Mr Jiang finally decides to disclose the truth in court. Jiongwan was with Mr Jiang at the time when Mayor Li was killed. (PG13-暴力镜头)(双声道-中/韩)尚弼入狱，于是交待在伊为炯万辩护。在伊带炯万的妻子去见姜老板。姜老板经不起炯万妻子的苦苦哀求，终于答应出庭当炯万的时间证人。其实当初李市长被杀时，炯万正在姜老板的店跟他索取保护费。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.title: 台湾1001个故事 2 Taiwan's 1001 Stories 2 - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) This food programme introduces Taiwan's traditional cuisines and their ingredients and spices. It also discloses touching stories behind the cuisines. (重)美食节目介绍有特色的台湾料理，也同时披露每道菜肴背后的感人故事。.

programme.title: 求学地图 Schools Unlimited - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) Australia is one of the countries which most Singaporeans choose for overseas study. This episode, host Michelle Chia visits two Singaporean students who are pursuing a medical degree and a double degree in Sydney to learn about their study life and compare the education system of the East and West. (重)澳大利亚是最多新加坡人选择留学的国家之一。这一集节目中，主持人谢韵仪拜访两位在悉尼修读医科和双学位的新加坡籍学生，并了解他们在袋鼠国求学以及学会独立生活的经历，同时也一窥东西方教学模式的差异。.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 84
programme.desc: (R) Jia-en is jealous of the amount of concern that Xiuqing is receiving from everyone around her, including Zaiyong. She thus purposely tells Xiuqing the real reason why Xiantai wants to go to France alone. Xiuqing consoles Yinghao upon knowing the truth. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)佳恩不满秀卿得到众人的关心，于是故意对她说贤泰为了要避开秀卿和她的家人才要去法国，而开车撞死英彩的人是英鎬。秀卿知道真相后，不但没有责怪英镐，反而安慰他。.

programme.title: 大力女都奉顺 Strong Girl Bong-Soon - EP 15
programme.desc: (R) Fengshun joins the Strategic Planning Department in Ainsoft. Wu Tongbing, head of the department, has a terrible reputation for treatment of new hires. Tongbing takes Fengshun to the conference room and scolds her for flirting with Minhe. Fengshun takes the opportunity to pick up the pen he threw to the other side of the table and then pushes the heavy table to trap Tongbing in a corner. (PG-些许性相关语)(重)(双声道-中/韩)奉顺进入企划开发部。企划一组的组长吴桐秉将奉顺叫到会议室，百般挑剔，用夸张的语气和言行让奉顺自己好好努力，绝对不可以靠敏赫的裙带关系下。奉顺火冒三丈，一手拾起笔，一手将桌子推向桐秉把他夹在桌子与玻璃窗之间，动弹不得。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 49
programme.desc: Ruli's parents discover that the call was dialled from the phone belonging Wulie's mother. Ruli confirms that Maya is the missing child. Wulie and Haizhu stop Ruli from taking Maya away. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)末年夫妇查出来电来自武烈妈妈的家。，玛亚承认之前看到传单打过电话，而传单上的那个人就是自己。如莉确定玛亚就是小春。武烈与海珠阻止如莉把玛亚带走。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 50
programme.desc: Maya learns that Ruli is her biological mother. Ruli finds Maya in a hotel. Haizhu is upset when Maya embraces Ruli. Daoying regains his memory but keeps it a secret from Zhiyuan. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)玛亚得知如莉是她亲生妈妈。如莉到酒店找玛亚。玛亚一见如莉便投入如莉的怀抱，海珠失望不已。道英为了不让智媛知道他已经发现她独吞了自己所有的财产，故意向智媛隐瞒他已经渐渐恢复记忆了。.

programme.title: 食材地图 Our Daily Food - EP 3
programme.desc: This episode, hosts Pornsak and Cui Fang head to Taiwan, Japan and Malaysia respectively to explore the brewing process of Taiwanese black bean soy sauce, understand the fermenting process of Japanese miso, tasting of the Shizuoka Crown Melon and discover the secret of rearing chicken in Malaysia. 在这一集的节目中，主持人Pornsak和林翠芳分别前往台湾、日本和马来西亚，一探台湾黑豆酱油的酿造过程，了解日本味噌的发酵熟成过程，品尝天价日本静冈网纹蜜瓜的滋味，发掘马来西亚肉鸡的养殖奥秘。.

programme.title: 武法律師 Lawless Lawyer - EP 5
programme.desc: Shangbi and his men track down Mayor Li's murderer. The murderer admits to his wrongdoing and says it was Wuzhou who instigated the murder. The murderer takes his own life after his confession as he knows Wuzhou will not let him off for telling Shangbi the truth. (PG13-暴力镜头)(双声道-中/韩)尚弼和手下们追踪到杀害李市长的真凶，跟他展开一场追逐战。真凶承认是五洲指使他杀了李市长的，但因为知道真相被揭发后五洲不可能放过他，于是故意跳轨自杀。.

programme.title: 烧。卖 Served H.O.T. - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) Tai Hu used a million dollars to tempt Hao Lun over to his side and bring the eatery down. Hao Lun could not resist the temptation and agreed. Qing Chun found out that Hao Lun received a huge sum of money. Hao Lun told her about his grand plan. Tai Long fell sick and lost his sense of taste. (PG)(重)浩伦不准清纯接近泰虎，兄妹发生口角。泰虎向小吃店下战书，泰龙不顾富贵反对，准备迎战。比赛在即，泰龙突然失去味觉，转而由富贵出战。正当美食评判准备试吃富贵煮出的肉骨茶时，竟有人爆出猪肉有虫。.

programme.title: 线人2 Fixer 2 - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) A group of people in Kazakhstan and Kyrgyzstan, who speaks the ancient Shaanxi and Gansu dialects, called themselves the Dungan. They have settled down in the foreign land and influenced by the forthright nature of the horse-backed nation. Let's take a look at the culture and life of the Dungan. (重)在哈萨克斯坦和吉尔吉斯斯坦，有一族群自称为东干人。说的是古老的陕西和甘肃话。来到异乡，马背民族的豪爽天性，感染了离乡背井的东干人，风霜雨露，落地生根。让我们跟着线人一起了解东干人的文化和目前生活状况。.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 85
programme.desc: (R) Xiuqing suffers a miscarriage after a quarrel with Shuzi. Xiuqing feels that Xiantai will only be able to experience true bliss if he cuts off ties with Xiuqing and her family entirely. Xiuqing, therefore, considers breaking up with Xiantai. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)秀卿与淑子争吵后流产。秀卿觉得自己和家人为贤泰带来太多不幸，觉得只有摆脱他们，贤泰才会自在地得到幸福，于是跟家人说她考虑跟贤泰分手。.

programme.title: 大力女都奉顺 Strong Girl Bong-Soon - EP 16
programme.desc: (R) Minhe confesses his feelings to Fengshun who does not know what to do because she has no experience. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)敏赫向奉顺告白，奉顺听后愣了一下，因为之前根本就没有类似的经验，所以奉顺完全不知道应该怎么处理。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 51
programme.desc: Daozhi and Ruli rush to stop Zhiyuan from holding a press conference to accuse Daozhi for embezzlement. Daoying decides to divorce Zhiyuan when he finds out that not only has she obtained the chairman's position through underhand methods, she has also tried to frame Daozhi. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)智媛打算秘密召开记者会诬蔑道治挪用公款，道治和如莉赶紧阻止。道英出现为道治作证。他知道智媛制造假的委任状登上会长的位置，现在还陷害道治，打算要跟她离婚。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 52
programme.desc: Zhiyuan attempts suicide to win back her husband's love but the latter remains unmoved as he knows it is her ploy. Daoying has brain tumour, but he keeps it a secret from Haizhu and Daozhi. Ruli is speechless when Xiaochun asks who her father is. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)智媛以自杀想挽回道英，后者知道这只是她的手段，坚持签离婚协议。道英得知自己得了脑肿瘤，保密不告诉海珠和道治。小春问如莉亲身爸爸是谁，如莉无法回答。.

programme.title: 寻医 A Medical Journey - EP 6
programme.desc: In India, 75% of the nation's health-related infrastructure, manpower and resources are concentrated in urban areas, serving only less than 30% of the population. Joanna Dong treks to the most remote, hilly areas of Darjeeling to investigate how the locals cope with the healthcare crisis. 在印度，住在大城市的30%人口，垂手即可享有全国高达75%的医疗资源。董姿彦前往海拔2300米的大吉岭山区，去了解住在交通不便的山村乡民们面对基本医疗需求，还有紧急医疗救助时，他们该向谁求助？.

programme.title: 武法律師 Lawless Lawyer - EP 6
programme.desc: Zaiyi asks Wenshu about her feud with Shangbi. Wenshu says Shangbi is displeased with her for sending him to jail previously and wants Zaiyi to distance herself from Shangbi. (PG13-暴力镜头)(双声道-中/韩)在伊追问文淑跟尚弼之间的恩怨。文淑说她因为用法律惩罚犯罪的人，所以有很多敌人。文淑说不愿意看到在伊跟有前科的尚弼工作，要介绍在伊到别的事务所工作。在伊考虑。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.title: 离家。出走 Greener Pastures - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) Chronic flooding in Bangladesh's Bhola Island has forced many residents to flee their homes. What lies ahead for these disaster-refugees? For many, life is often a gamble between surviving the high waters or a chance at a better tomorrow. (重)家园不停地被大水淹没、冲毁，一次又一次的被迫离家，对孟加拉波拉岛的许多岛民来说，只能默默地承受。这些气候难民过着怎样的生活？他们的命运能否改变？对于未来，他们已经无力去思考，因为他们永远不知道大水和明天，到底哪一个会先来？.

programme.title: 吃。东西 World Food - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) The topic of this episode is ham and sausage. Guo Liang, Axian and Pornsak introduce and compare Chinese and Western hams, such as Jinhua and Yunnan's Nuodeng hams, Iberian and Italian hams, An Chang sausage, Cantonese and Italian sausages, the production and ways of eating these hams and sausages. (重)这集的节目主题是火腿和香肠。郭亮，阿贤和Pornsak会为我们介绍和对比中西方火腿，如金华和云南诺邓火腿，西班牙伊比利亚和意大利的火腿，安昌腊肠，广式腊肠和意大利香肠，中西方的火腿和腊肠的制作与吃法。.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 86
programme.desc: (R) Yinghao fires Zaiyong and resigns from his position as Chairman. Zaiyong is displeased and wants to tell reporters of Yinghao's action four years ago. Unexpectedly, however, Yinghao has already contacted the media and also surrenders himself to the police. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)英鎬解雇载永后，交出会长的职位。载永不满，想向记者透露英鎬肇事逃逸的事，但英鎬已经主动联络记者，还到警局自首。.

programme.title: 大力女都奉顺 Strong Girl Bong-Soon - EP 17
programme.desc: (R) Changxian uses Xizhi as bait to distract the police so that he could snatch Jingxin. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)长贤把熙智当诱饵丟向警察。虽然警察贴身保护熙智，但长贤很轻易地带走了京心。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 53
programme.desc: To end the conflict between Zhiyuan and Ruli; Daoying wants Zhiyuan to surrender custody of Xiaochun to Ruli and requests Ruli to divorce Daozhi. Ruli is torn but Zhiyuan assures Ruli that she will never give Xiaochun up. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)为了摆平智媛与如莉的纠纷，道英提出智媛必须放弃小春的监护权，而如离必须在道治和小春当中选择一个，如离一个也割舍不下而智媛声明就算如莉跟道治离婚，她也不会放弃小春的监护权。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 54
programme.desc: Zhiyuan learns that Daoying has brain tumour and Daozhi flares up on Daoying's demand to Ruli. Wulie overheard Daoying looking for Haizhu's biological mother. Ruli losses Xiaochun's custody to Wulie. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)智媛得知道英患脑肿瘤. 道治对道英向如莉的要求感到愤怒. 武烈偷听到道英在寻找海珠亲生母亲的消息. 在法庭上, 如莉失去小春的抚养权.

programme.title: 人间蒸发 Missing - EP 1
programme.desc: In South Korea, there are about 600 children under 18 years old, who have been missing for long term. The distressed parents travelled the whole nation distributing flyers and putting up banners, trying everything to find their loved one. However, it was to no avail even after 30 years of searching. (首播)孩子失踪了，怎么办？韩国有大约600个，年龄低于18岁、长期失踪的孩子。他们的父母虽然活在等待和内疚之中，却心存希望的上网、派传单、挂布条，辛苦地找下去。有些家长找了30年、生了病，孩子仍然了无音讯。.

programme.title: 武法律師 Lawless Lawyer - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) Zaiyi asks Shangbi if Xianzhu's disappearance is related to Zhen-ai's death. Shangbi confirms her suspicion and also tells her that Wenshu is involved in both cases. (PG13-暴力镜头)(双声道-中/韩)在伊猜到贤珠的失踪跟珍爱的死可能有关联，于是向尚弼查证。尚弼坦言两件案子都跟文淑脱离不了关系。在伊大受打击。.

programme.title: 看见你的声音 I Can See Your Voice - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) "I Can See Your Voice" is a reality show in which guests must attempt to determine whether the contestant is a skilled vocalist or a tone-deaf contestant without hearing them sing. (重)《看見你的声音》是一档嘉宾凭视觉判断选手是否专业演唱实力还是音痴的新概念推理类音乐综艺节目。.

programme.title: 加文纳桥的约定 Love At Cavenagh Bridge - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Jia Ming and Wan Jun were married for seven years before their marriage fell victim to infidelity. Before they signed the divorce papers, Wan Jun decided to give Jia Ming a chance, by promising to meet him again one month later on Cavenagh Bridge, the place where their love blossomed, to relive the happy moments they once had. If by then, Wan Jun is still unable to forgive Jia Ming, he will accept the divorce. At the same place, but in a different time, with a different feeling, will they be able to rekindle the flame of their love, and salvage their marriage? One quiet midnight of the Lunar 7th month, Jackie and Jessie, who both got ditched by their partners respectively, met coincidentally on Cavenagh Bridge. When he first met Jessie, Jackie thought he saw a ghost, but little did he know that this ghost would become the love of his life. Jessie shared the same views as him, on love, life and things bigger than life. Even though they met at the wrong time and place, they were (PG)(重)家明和婉君始终敌不过七年之痒，婚姻濒临破裂。在签字前，婉君答应家明，给他一个月的时间，回到加纹纳桥上，重温两人七年来反而各个重要日子。如果一个月后，婉君仍然无法重新接受家明，他就会欣然签字。同样的地方，不同的时间，不同的心境，两夫妻还能重新种植这株“爱的幼苗"吗？两个刚刚被各自男女朋友抛弃的男女，杰奇和杰西在农历七月期间的夜晚，竟然在半夜的桥上相遇。以为撞鬼的杰奇却和杰西撞出了火花，两个不管是爱情观、人生观都相似的人，终于在看似错的时间和的地方“撞"上对的彼此。加纹纳桥顿时成为两人之间的真正桥梁…….

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 87
programme.desc: (R) Shuzi apologises to Zhenshu for all the suffering that she has caused her. Shuzi passes away before Yinghao reaches the hospital. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)淑子主动要医院联络真淑，说有话跟真淑说。淑子向真淑道歉，说是她毁了真淑的人生。过后，淑子一直等着英镐赶到医院，但还没等到英镐就离世了。.

programme.title: 大力女都奉顺 Strong Girl Bong-Soon - EP 18
programme.desc: (R) Fengshun sends a text message to Jingxin and notices that Jingxin's response is unusual. Fengshun hurriedly calls Guodou as she realizes that Jingxin is in danger. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)奉顺给京心发短信，却发现京心对自己的称呼从奉奉改成了奉顺。奉顺察觉到不对，奉顺意识到京心遇到了危险，奉顺赶紧给国斗打电话。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 55
programme.desc: Haizhu discovers Daoying's ex-wife, Cui Meixi, is her biological mother. Daozhi and Ruli check with Dr Jin and realizes Zhiyuan had adopted Xiaochun with an ulterior motive. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)海珠发现道英前妻崔美熙竟是她的生母.经通过金医生确认, 道治与如莉发现智媛领养小春怀有不良目的.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 56
programme.desc: Jiaya has leukaemia and needs bone marrow transplant. Dr Jin informs Zhiyuan that they have a donor. Zhiyuan gives up Xiaochun's custody to Ruli in order to stop her from holding a press conference against her. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)嘉亚患白血病必须骨髓移植, 金医生告诉智媛名单有一名捐赠者.为了阻止如莉开记者招待会揭发她,智媛愿意还小春的监护权给如莉.

programme.title: 台湾1001个故事 3 Taiwan's 1001 Stories 3 - EP 5
programme.desc: Hosted by Bai Xinyi, this food programme introduces Taiwan's traditional cuisines and their ingredients and spices. It also discloses touching stories behind the cuisines. 介绍台湾在地食材的故事，也是台湾最深刻的人生故事。故事的主角们，有的为着有机农业奋斗打拼，为这片土地奉献青春与血汗。 有的则是经过千百次的调味与尝试，只为了成就一道美味料理。对比着经营者与料理人的故事，他们或是为生活中年转业、或是离乡背井追寻梦想，人生路上各自遭逢百转千折的冲突与适应，才能在逆境中成功蜕变。.

programme.title: 武法律師 Lawless Lawyer - EP 8
programme.desc: Shangbi and Zaiyi suspect that Officer Min has made up the evidence related to Mayor Li's murder and has also been releasing confidential investigation information to Wuzhou. (PG13-暴力镜头)(双声道-中/韩)尚弼和在伊怀疑闵搜查官伪造了李市长命案的所有证据，并一直泄露机密给五洲。原来造假影片中的凶手就是闵搜查官扮的。.
